Key Match Events: Bulgaria scored in the 40th minute and defended strongly to claim all three points.
Bailey Peacock-Farrell made a superb save from Georgi Kostadinov's header.
Ciaron Brown cleared the ball off the line, which then hit the post before being gathered by the keeper.
Isaac Price had a shot straight at Bulgaria keeper Dimitar Mitov.
Kiril Despodov's curling free-kick hit the post.
Aleksandar Kolev's weak shot was saved by Peacock-Farrell.
Kiril Despodov scored the only goal of the match from four yards out.
Shayne Lavery had a powerful shot saved by Mitov but was flagged offside.
Shea Charles whipped a corner towards Daniel Ballard, whose header sailed wide.
Post-Match Reflections: Northern Ireland slipped to third place in the group behind Bulgaria and Belarus.
Michael O’Neill’s side upped the tempo in the second half but could not find an equalizer.
The game was particularly scrappy in the closing stages.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in sultry conditions on a lumpy pitch at Stadion Hristo Botev in Plovdiv.
Bulgaria has a much older age profile than Northern Ireland’s line-up.
Northern Ireland enjoyed a comfortable 2-0 win over Luxembourg in their C3 opener.
